hibernate-mapping.query: select iiws.Id from InstallerInWorkStation as iiws where iiws.WorkStationId = :workStationId and iiws.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId and iiws.IsDownloadOnly = :isDownloadOnly and iiws.Active = true

select new cccomdto05 ( iiw.Id, iiw.TS, w.Id, i.Id, w.SourceBranchCode, w.Code, w.HostName, i.Code, i.Description ) from InstallerInWorkStation as iiw inner join iiw.WorkStation as w with w.Active = true inner join iiw.InstallerType as i with i.Active = true where w.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranchCode and iiw.WorkStationId = :workStationId and iiw.IsDownloadOnly = true and iiw.Active = true

update InstallerInWorkStation iiw set iiw.WorkStationId = :workStationId, iiw.InstallerTypeId = :installerTypeId, iiw.IsDownloadOnly = true, iiw.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, iiw.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where iiw.Id = :id and iiw.TS = :ts and iiw.Active = true
